aboutContent: My name is Marina and I am a certified nail technician. It is important for me that my client is satisfied with the quality and level of service provided.

price.manicure_removal_coating: Manicure with removal and coating 'gel polish'
price.manicure_correction_coating: Manicure + correction + coating in one tone
price.pedicure_removal_coating: Pedicure with removal and single-color coating

materialsContent: In my work, I use only proven materials so that my clients are always satisfied with the quality and durability of the nail coating.
